content.raw: @jhoare After messing around with forks for a while, I ended up submitting this new pull request with your changes from pull request #138, after resolving conflicts that had accumulated since your original submission.  @hsu approved the previous version and I've approved this one, so if you give it a once-over to make sure that I didn't mess something up in the resubmission and approve, then we'll get it merged.
